Package burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LearningAgent
    This is the standard interface for defining an agent that learns how to behave in the world through experience.
    LearningAgentFactory
    A factory interface for generating learning agents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GoalBasedRF
    A reward function implementation designed around goal conditions that are specified by a StateConditionTest object.
    LearningAgent.LearningAgentBookKeeping
    Because LearningAgent is an interface, default methods for managing the history of experienced episodes is not provided.
